timestamp.description: The timestamp of the log entry, in ISO 8601 format

source.description: The source of the log (e.g., system component, service, or app)

summary_text.description: A concise summary of the log content

os_type.description: The operating system from which the log originates

event_id.description: Optional: Event ID for OS-specific logs (Windows CBS, Event Log)

facility.description: Optional: Facility or subsystem for Unix/Linux logs

process_name.description: Optional: Name of the process generating the log

component.description: Optional: Component within the OS or service

additional_info.description: Optional: Any extra key-value pairs specific to the log type
